subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Brown, who led the Knicks to a 23-59 record in 2005-6, said, among other things, that his former employer was treating the current coach, Mike Woodson, unfairly.
snippet: Brown, who led the Knicks to a 23-59 record in 2005-6, said, among other things, that his former employer was treating the current coach, Mike Woodson, unfairly.
